column5: Complete waste of a good fishing day today, I won't even get into the reasons why....  Anywho... as the title says... send me pm if you want them. I bought them today.
Just got home and saw a guy dragging his sled out front (really!) - want me to run out and see if he can use them? Dying to know what happened to your day....  Michael
know how ya feel   better luck next time.
Get your binoculars on him! If he is catching fish, we should try that exact same spot next time haha.  Perfectly good minnows for all you spec/splake fishermen in the Bay area.
Nuts, the wife just told me I'm not allowed to drive 5 hours round trip for $3.00 worth of minnows...the woman just doesn't understand a good deal
I can ship them out with a fragile sticker. its around 30 for shipping but the minnows are FREE!
I can pick them up in June.
Throw 'em in salt and freeze em
I'll wait for smelt season before I eat minnows.     Probably that's what I'll do if I can't give 'em away. I have a fresh bag of pickling salt in the cupboard....
Dry good....salt and refrigerate ....freezing makes them mushy...they keep a LONG time.
